page.title: 12AT WORK IN MILDENHALL
page.content: In our area{farm work}is the main employment, but there are other places of work.The{sewage farm}handles over 750,000 gallons of sewage a day.It occupies an area of 5 acres and 2 workers are employed.The farm handles all the waste from Marlborough, Ogbourne and Mildenhall.{Ceramic {Tiles}employ 28 people.It owns 3 shops and has a warehouse just outside of Marlborough.The factory belonging to the{Rayner Optical Co}is their second largest factory.They mainly make lenses for spectacles, but have made swimming goggles and telescopes.In the village of Axford there are 2 small businesses.One of them makes{masts}for boats and produces 400 masts a year. The{vineyard}was founded in 1976 and has 13 acres of land.Each year the 8 workers produce 11,500 bottles of white wine.
